name: Patellar Tendonitis
chief_complaint: Pain below my kneecap that gets worse when I jump or run
physical_findings: Tenderness on palpation of patellar tendon
treatment: Physical therapy focusing on eccentric strengthening
prognosis: Excellent with proper rest and rehabilitation; typically resolves within 4-6 weeks
description: Inflammation of the patellar tendon, commonly seen in athletes who perform frequent jumping activities (jumper's knee). Caused by repetitive stress on the tendon connecting the kneecap to the shinbone.
